title: Was PEview developed using Delphi?
content: I was checking PEview.exe image section headers and I didn't find the .txt section, but i found code section instead, it means it was developed using Delphi, right?

answers_data.content: Nope ... Here's the environement used to develop it GoDevTool. Given what I read about the GoDevTool, it looks it might have been written in 32bit Windows assembly which was interfaced with a Go API.
